author: Dana Mattioli
title: Intel, Facing Threat, Considers Deals That Could Include Bid
text:
Intel Corp. is considering a range of acquisition alternatives in reaction to Broadcom Ltd.â€™s hostile pursuit for Qualcomm Inc. that could include a bid for Broadcom, according to people familiar with the matter.
Intel is watching the takeover battle closely and is eager for Broadcom to fail as the combined company would pose a serious competitive threat, the people said. If it becomes apparent that Broadcom is likely to prevail, Intel could step in with its own offer for Broadcom, the people said.
...
